item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @Josh_K0 Josh K0
item.description:
@Josh_K0 wrote:

ok guys im having a compile issue and i need some help here is the code of compile

@echo off
title compile
cd …/build
echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” -cp . -d …/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
pause

can someone help or tell wuts wrong?
it says
: compiling net/com/codeusa/engine.java
un reconized option : -d
could not create the java virtual machine :
?

Read full topic
